message.body: Do you have plans for before prom?
Renting a tux? I'm not sure when i'm supposed to do that but not really lmao whats up?
Lol you should do that asap! If you don't have other plans there is a pre prom party at my house
Ayyy nice but at what time? Lol is there an event page to direct my questions?
Haha no event page. It's at like 5 or 5:30 just so people can get dressed and take pictures and then travel to prom together
Awk i'd have to be with cassie by four thirty to five, prom starts at seven?
Yeah it starts at 7:30. It's ok if you have plans with your other group i just wanted to see if you were available to come to mine. We'll see you at the prom! Also are you going to the end on weds
Yes i am lmao i decided it would be a handy investment to come see the show indeed
Haha yay! I'm not performing in it after all but it still will be great!
I hear the micks will be there yes?
